attributes.action: Negotiate with the EU for British citizens right to re-settle in EU post-Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to protect the rights of the British Remain supporters to retain their EU citizenship by migrating to other EU countries. As part of the negotiations, ask the EU to ensure British Citizens who don't want to live in post-brexit Britain, have a right to migrate to EU countries and apply for EU citizenship there.
attributes.background: Over 50 million British people will lose their rights as EU citizens, due to the votes of 17 million British voters. Remain supporters despise the direction the government is taking regarding Brexit and many would like to emigrate and apply for EU citizenship in other countries.
